# Required Packages

* shiny
* shinydashboard
* tidyverse
* DT
* caret
* ggfortify
* plotly

Use this line of code to install all required packages:  

```{r, echo = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
install.packages(c("shiny", "shinydashboard", "tidyverse", "DT", "caret", "ggfortify", "plotly"))
```


# Run the Shiny app from your R studio

Use `shiny::runGitHub("ST558_project_3", "snprim", ref = "main", subdir = "breastCancer")` to run the app in your Rstudio.
